<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker/#ac617e33450ffda81e4b830543674abbf"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker/#a0b4a3e47e33b66648a8b870f6182c1f2">SampleContextTracker::getBaseSamplesFor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionid">FunctionId</a> Name,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeContext) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Getting base profile for function: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Name &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Base profile is top-level node (child of root node), so try to retrieve</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// existing top-level node for given function first. If it exists, it could be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we&#39;ve merged base profile before, or there&#39;s actually context-less</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profile from the input (e.g. due to unreliable stack walking).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/contexttrienode">ContextTrieNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = getTopLevelContextNode(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MergeContext) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;  Merging context profile into base profile: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Name</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have profile for function under different contexts,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// create synthetic base profile and merge context profiles</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into base profile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CSamples : FuncToCtxtProfiles&#91;Name&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/samplecontext">SampleContext</a> &amp;Context = CSamples-&gt;getContext();</Highlight></CodeLine>
